item.title: 搜索练习
item.description: 以下题目来自洛谷 P1379 八数码难题 AC代码 #include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std; const int maxn = 4e5; typedef int state[9]; state st[maxn], goal; int dist[maxn]; const int dx[] = {0, 0, -1, 1}; const int dy[] = {-1, 1, 0, 0}; set&lt;int&gt; vis; bool try_insert(int s) { int res = 0; for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) res = res * 10 + st[s][i]; if (vis.count(res)) return false; vis.insert(res); return true; } int bfs() { vis.
